dmca.title: Copyright infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Balboni, Jeff [mailto:Jeff.Balboni@FMR.COM] 
Posted At: Thursday, July 06, 2006 2:46 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Copyright infringement
Subject: Copyright infringement



The following site which is hosted by theplanet.,com is making illegal
use of our name.  The url can be found below 
http://chenille-flower.lycan.be/carnivorous-plants.html
<http://chenille-flower.lycan.be/carnivorous-plants.html>  

You will find in the text unqiuehomestore along with are copyright
notice and our copyright information. We would like this site removed
ASAP.

Thanks, 

Jeff Balboni 
508-776-9922
